entry.title: My Dogtor Thinks I'm Dying
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,440Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 45

Summary: Stiles doesn’t think there’s anything wrong with him, except maybe chronic over-caffeination. But his dad’s retired K-9, Bandit, disagrees. According to TikTok, that means cancer. Or seizures. Or secret pregnancy. Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. It’s fine. Totally fine. Not a meet-cute. Definitely not.

entry.title: Prompt: Coming untouched (Sterek)
entry.summary:
Author: Totallyashipper

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,011Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: "You talk too much" He growled.  "Don't people usually talk during these sort of things? Actually knowing you probably not, far too brooding and mysterious for that"  Derek fixed him a stern glare "Stiles. Take off your trousers before I rip them off. With my teeth"  That was all it took for him to leap into action, stripping both his plaid pattered pajamas and boxers in one go, he was sure Derek could smell how turned on his was. He wondered if he could smell that he was a virgin, maybe that's why he had been practically sniffing his neck a few moments before. But then again he was a werewolf and they liked to sniff, it was kind of their thing.

entry.title: The golden couple
entry.summary:
Author: Anything00but

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,568Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles is dating Derek. Everyone says they are to perfect couple, the golden couple. A relationship everyone can only dream about. And it is- it really is- at least that's what Stiles keeps telling himself. He's happy with Derek, he loves the alpha, truly. But it's not what he wants, and he knows it deep down, as days keep blending together, and he keeps going through the motion just to keep others happy because they keep telling him to hold on to this relationship. Then Peter starts catching Stiles' attention, and for the first time in years Stiles feels like he can breathe. With Peter there's no expectations, no image to uphold. Just him, Stiles, and Peter sees him. Not the spark, not the alpha's boyfriend, just Stiles.

entry.title: Day 2 - Save me, and prove my belonging
entry.summary:
Author: MightyHoneyBadger

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,212Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: Stiles Stilinski has the worst luck: another day, another kidnapping. Blindfolded, bound, and stuck with a swamp monster demanding Scott’s whereabouts, he’s seconds from panic when Derek Hale tears the door off its hinges. But saving Stiles isn’t enough—Derek can still smell the creature all over him, and nothing less than erasing that scent will do. What starts as a rescue turns into something darker, hungrier, and impossibly intimate. Derek needs Stiles marked inside and out, and Stiles—well, he’s more than willing to let him.

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,788Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 997

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,782Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: After Tobia Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stiliski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles.Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,179Chapters: 14/18Kudos: 15

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,016Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 100

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Crown of Forget-Me-Not's
entry.summary:
Author: CozyEarth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,333Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Grief is a funny thing.It hits everyone differently and presents itself in many different forms.They say that there are five stages of grief, but for Stiles, they all ended with him crying.Stiles always hated the crying.Sorrowful tears that would make him spiral into despair. Hatefully angry tears that burned his eyes and fueled his sharp tongue. Happy tears that washed over a wave of melancholy.Stiles hated it every single time.Because when Stiles cried, it was all consuming. -Losing a parent hurts.Even when it's years later.Even when the world gets turned on its head, the supernatural is real, and your best friend leaves you to the wolves for a girl.Literally!Stiles knows he has a lot to work through, but everything keeps piling up.What will be the breaking point?And will he allow himself to ask for help?
